title: Syria claims U.S. launched missile strike on air base; Pentagon denies it
text:
Syria claims U.S. launched missile strike on air base; Pentagon denies it Monday, April 09, 2018 - 01:31 
Syrian state TV said there were casualties in what it said was a suspected U.S. missile strike on a major Syrian air base, but the Pentagon said it was not conducting air strikes in Syria ''at this time''. Ed Giles reports.   
Syrian state TV said there were casualties in what it said was a suspected U.S. missile strike on a major Syrian air base, but the Pentagon said it was not conducting air strikes in Syria "at this time". Ed Giles reports.  //reut.rs/2qihtae
